issues.description: The solution implementation declares getLectureName() and getNumberOfInscribedStudents() as private, but the exercise requires public getters for all attributes (e.g., to satisfy getLectureNameTest() and getNumberOfInscribedStudentsTest()). This visibility mismatch will prevent students and tests from accessing these methods.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the access modifiers of getLectureName() and getNumberOfInscribedStudents() in Lecture.java from private to public, so they can be accessed externally and match the intended design.
